short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, customizable Pomodoro timer to keep you on track

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pomodoro Timer is the best way to use the Pomodoro technique. The timer is customizable, so you can use whatever Pomodoro or break lengths that work for you. The customized lengths will be synced on any Chrome browser that's logged into your Google account. Once a Pomodoro or break is complete, we will notify you and you can start the next timer straight from the notification popup.

This extension is completely free to use and has no ads or data collection of any kind. If you find this helpful and would like to say thanks, I'd really appreciate a coffee!

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/norbusonam
